Package com.ibm.service

Interface MovieService

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface MovieService
Service interface for managing movies.

  • Method Details

    • save

      int save(Movie movie, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image) throws MovieAlreadyExistException
      Saves a new movie with the provided details and image.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie entity to be saved
      image - the image file of the movie
      Returns:
      the ID of the saved movie
      Throws:
      MovieAlreadyExistException - if a movie with the same name already exists

    • update

      int update(Movie movie) throws MovieNotFoundException
      Updates an existing movie with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      movie - the updated movie entity
      Returns:
      the ID of the updated movie
      Throws:
      MovieNotFoundException - if the movie with the specified ID is not found

    • list

      List<Movie> list()
      Retrieves a list of all movies.
      Returns:
      a list of Movie entities

    • searchById

      Movie searchById(int id) throws MovieNotFoundException
      Searches for a movie by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the movie to search for
      Returns:
      the found Movie entity
      Throws:
      MovieNotFoundException - if the movie with the specified ID is not found

    • searchByName

      Movie searchByName(String name) throws MovieNotFoundException
      Searches for a movie by name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the movie to search for
      Returns:
      the found Movie entity
      Throws:
      MovieNotFoundException - if the movie with the specified name is not found
